name: 故鄉戰爭 HOMETOWN WAR
description:
HOMETOWN WAR History
The Battle for Sihang Warehouse took place from October 26 to November 1, 1937
The Battle for Sihang Warehouse held out against numerous waves of Imperial Japanese Army and covered National Revolutionary Army retreating west during the Battle of Shanghai.
The successful battle at Sihang Warehouse provided a morale-lifting consolation to people
Let's treasure our homeland together
Not easy to come by.

HOMETOWN WAR
Multiplayer FPS Game
This include 3 Game Modes:
Battle
Reserve Training
Occupy Action (Guerrilla warfare)

SinglePlayer mode : Players and our AI fight against enemy AI
Multiplayer mode : In the beginning, open permissions to 4 players and combine players and our AI to fight against the enemy AI
Weapon Guns : WWII weapons that existed before 1937

Simulate more enemies and fewer us, how to defeat more enemies with fewer us !
